mapper.sql: id, `name`, license, lisn_type, mobile, `status`, person_id, belong_comid
mapper.select:
select
from veh_driver where 1 = 1
AND `name` LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%'))
AND license LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{license,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%'))
AND lisn_type = #{lisn_type,jdbcType=INTEGER}
AND mobile LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%'))
AND status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into veh_driver (`name`, license, lisn_type, mobile, `status`, person_id, belong_comid) values (#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{license,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lisnType,typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.EnumOrdinalTypeHandler}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.EnumOrdinalTypeHandler}, #{personId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{belongComid,jdbcType=BIGINT})

mapper.update:
update veh_driver
`name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
license = #{license,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
lisn_type = #{lisnType,typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.EnumOrdinalTypeHandler},
